Detailed Description

Obsolete - use the CheckBoxControl or the CheckBoxAction in combination with a listbox instead.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

) 
 

Parameters:
item CheckBoxItem to be added to the item list.
after By default (0) the item is appended to the end of the item list. Otherwise it will be inserted after this item.
